source.30575a5b: The probability of survive of each subgroup is the target mean of that subgroup.
source.a69ed150: Some subgroups don't appear at train but only at test, thats why there are some NaNs in the predictions. To fill those NaNs we are going to do the same procedure without the Cabin variable.
source.f8fc6ce9: We can calculate the target mean of the different subgroups of this categorical variables as you can see below.
